mapper.sql: tid as tid, tn_id as tnId, teach_date as teachDate, teach_detail as teachDetail, create_date as createDate, task_id as taskId
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO saas_jw_teach_date ( tid, tn_id, teach_date, teach_detail, create_date, task_id ) VALUES ( #{tid}, #{tnId}, #{teachDate}, #{teachDetail}, #{createDate}, #{taskId} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE saas_jw_teach_date
tn_id = #{tnId},
teach_date = #{teachDate},
teach_detail = #{teachDetail},
create_date = #{createDate},
task_id = #{taskId},
WHERE tid = #{tid}

UPDATE saas_jw_teach_date
tn_id = #{map.tnId},
teach_date = #{map.teachDate},
teach_detail = #{map.teachDetail},
create_date = #{map.createDate},
task_id = #{map.taskId},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO saas_jw_teach_date ( tid, tn_id, teach_date, teach_detail, create_date, task_id ) VALUES ( #{map.tid}, #{map.tnId}, #{map.teachDate}, #{map.teachDetail}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.taskId} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM saas_jw_teach_date
AND tid like CONCAT('%', #{tid} , '%')
AND tn_id like CONCAT('%', #{tnId} , '%')
AND teach_date like CONCAT('%', #{teachDate} , '%')
AND teach_detail like CONCAT('%', #{teachDetail} , '%')
AND create_date like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
AND task_id like CONCAT('%', #{taskId} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
